content.rendered:
Skill game, classic mode from your favorite games right in the browser on your computer and phone! 35 unique levels, varied mechanics and real hardcore await you

Desktop: • SPACE – jump • WASD – move • L. SHIFT – running • Double Escape – Menu Mobile: • Touch
